docs.summary: The wix-configs-backend module contains functionality for working with user-configured data in Velo package code.
description: > This module is intended for use when building [Velo packages](https://support.wix.com/en/article/creating-a-velo-package-3964385) in Wix Blocks.
To use the module, import the `getPackageConfig` function from `wix-configs-backend`:
When you build a Velo package, you can include a `config.json` file that gets installed together with the package.
Unlike other package files, users of the package can edit `config.json` and add personalized information such as settings preferences.
The `wix-configs-backend` module allows you to access the contents of the `config.json` file in
your package code, using the [`getPackageConfig`](#getPackageConfig) function.

params.name: key
params.doc: The `config.json` key whose value you want to retrieve.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The value of the requested key.

docs.summary: Retrieves the value of a specific key in a package's `config.json` file.

examples.title: Retreive a user's ID number from the config.json file
